辦.definition: to do; to manage; to handle; to go about; to run; to set up; to deal with

辦不到.definition: cannot be done; not feasible; impossible to accomplish

辦公.definition: to handle official business (usu. in an office); to do (office) work

辦報.definition: to run a newspaper; to publish a newspaper

辦好.definition: to take care of (a matter); to get (a task) done; to handle (a project) expeditiously

辦妥.definition: to arrange; to settle; to complete; to carry through

辦年貨.definition: to shop in preparation for Chinese New Year

辦桌.definition: (Tw) to hold a banquet; to provide catering; catering; banquet; roadside banquet (Taiwanese-style banquet, typically held under large tents in the street, to celebrate special occasions)

辦法.definition: means; method; way (of doing sth); CL:條|条[tiao2],個|个[ge4]

辦理.definition: to handle; to transact; to conduct

辦貨.definition: to purchase goods (for a company etc)
